name: DeVere Chemical Acid CIP
description: DeVere Chemical Acid CIP is a concentrated, low-foam liquid acid rinse. This product is designed for use in the final rinse cycle after an alkaline clean-in-place wash. Acid CIP works best where low-foam characteristics are desirable and soils are primarily mineral. Acid CIP is strong enough to handle the most challenging mineral soils and works well even in very hard water. This product is free-rinsing with normal water pressure.
